facebookToken: your facebook api token goes here

web.recaptchaKey: your recaptcha secret key goes here

sso.endpoint: contact gbl08ma - gabriel at tny.im - to get an SSO endpoint for tests

telemetry.statsdAddress: your statsd server goes here, remove the whole telemetry key to disable statsd. include the port too, like this: example.com:8125

discord.token: your discord bot token goes here, remove the whole discord key to disable discord bot
discord.adminChannel: put here channel ID of special admin channel where anyone can use admin commands, or leave blank
